title: Pork imports of selected countries worldwide 2020 , by country
yAxis: Import volume in thousand metric tones
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Import volume in thousand metric tones in the y axis.
The maximum Import volume in thousand metric tones 3700.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Canada where Country is 260.0.
Country Canada has 14.23 times less Import volume in thousand metric tones than Country China which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Import volume in thousand metric tones in the y axis.
Country China has the highest Import volume in thousand metric tones and Canada has the lowest Import volume in thousand metric tones.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Import volume in thousand metric tones in the y axis.
The maximum Import volume in thousand metric tones 3700.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Canada where Country is 260.0.
Country Canada has 14.23 times less Import volume in thousand metric tones than Country China which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Import volume in thousand metric tones for 9 number of Countrys.
The maximum Import volume in thousand metric tones 3700.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Canada where Country is 260.0.
Second maximum Import volume in thousand metric tones is found at Country Others.
There is a difference of 3440.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Canada.
Import volume in thousand metric tones at Country China is 3700.0 , second place is Others at 1590.0, and thirdly is Japan at 1490.0.
Country Hong Kong, and Philippines have the same Import volume in thousand metric tones.
Considered together, the average Import volume in thousand metric tones in all 9 Countrys is roughly 1107.89.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 9971.0.
